name: Association of the Dutch Metallurgical Industry
memberOrga: For a list of VNMI member companies, please check the following website: http://www.vnmi.nl/index.php?page=16
goal:
VNMI has the following goals on behalf of its member companies:
- Health & Safety
- Circular Economy
- Climate (Paris Agreement)/Energy Efficiency/CO2
- International Corporate Social Responsibility
- Environment
- Innovation, Research & Development
- Trade & Employment
- Public relations, PR & Lobby in NL and EU
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Emission Trading Scheme
Circular Economy Package
Conflict Minerals Regulation
Energy Efficiency
EU Trade Policy
